content: The common perception of ChatGPT 5.1 as merely 'warmer' is an oversimplification of its actual changes.
ChatGPT 5.1 is the first truly agentic build model.

Key advancements in ChatGPT 5.1 include enhanced instruction following (like real specs), dual brain functionality (instant vs. thinking for latency-reasoning tradeoffs), spec-driven prompting for workflows and tools, and improved reliability, verification, and judgment.
Teams that learn to write simple specifications and apply real judgment will outperform those treating AI as a parlor trick.
